mapper.insert: insert into favorites (user_id, goods_id, create_time, update_time) values (#{userId}, #{goodsId}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.delete: delete from favorites where user_id = #{userId} and goods_id = #{goodsId}
mapper.select: select * from favorites where user_id = #{userId} and goods_id = #{goodsId}
select g.* from goods g inner join favorites f on g.id = f.goods_id where f.user_id = #{userId} order by f.create_time desc
